Package view

Interface AdvancedStockView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StockView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedStockViewImpl, GUIStockView
    public interface AdvancedStockView
extends StockView
    The AdvancedStockView interface extends the StockView interface to support additional methods for advanced functionalities in a stock management application. This interface provides methods for displaying various details and performing operations on stocks and portfolios, enhancing the capabilities provided by the StockView interface.

    • Method Detail

      • composition

        void composition​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                 java.lang.String stockAmounts)
        Displays the composition of a specified portfolio, showing the amounts of each stock in it.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the name of the portfolio.
        stockAmounts - a formatted string representing the amounts of each stock in the portfolio.

      • distribution

        void distribution​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                  java.lang.String stockValues)
        Displays the distribution of a specified portfolio, showing the values of each stock in it.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the name of the portfolio.
        stockValues - a formatted string representing the values of each stock in the portfolio.

      • saveCurrentPortfolio

        void saveCurrentPortfolio()
        Displays a message confirming that the current state of the portfolio has been saved.

      • buyBalanced

        void buyBalanced​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> stockAmounts,
                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Double> stockWeights)
        Displays a message confirming the purchase of a balanced set of stocks.
        Parameters:
        stockAmounts - a map containing stock tickers as keys and the amounts purchased as values.
        stockWeights - a map containing stock tickers as keys and their corresponding as values.

      • reBalance

        void reBalance()
        Displays a message confirming that the portfolio has been rebalanced.

      • plotStockValue

        void plotStockValue​(java.lang.String ticker,
                    java.lang.String modelOutput,
                    java.time.LocalDate date1,
                    java.time.LocalDate date2)
        Displays a plot showing the value of a specified stock over a given date range.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock.
        modelOutput - a formatted string representing the model output used for plotting.
        date1 - the start date for the plot.
        date2 - the end date for the plot.

      • plotPortfolio

        void plotPortfolio​(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                   java.lang.String plottedInfo,
                   java.time.LocalDate date1,
                   java.time.LocalDate date2)
        Displays a plot showing the information of a specified portfolio over a given date range.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - the name of the portfolio.
        plottedInfo - a formatted string representing the information to be plotted.
        date1 - the start date for the plot.
        date2 - the end date for the plot.

      • displayBuy

        void displayBuy​(java.lang.String ticker,
                int amount,
                double value,
                java.time.LocalDate date)
        Displays a message confirming that a stock has been bought, including the date of purchase.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock that was bought.
        amount - the amount of the stock that was bought.
        value - the total value of that stock now owned (including previously owned stock).
        date - the date when the stock was bought.

      • displaySell

        void displaySell​(java.lang.String ticker,
                 int amount,
                 double value,
                 java.time.LocalDate date)
        Displays a message confirming that a stock has been sold, including the date of sale.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the ticker of the stock that was sold.
        amount - the amount of the stock that was sold.
        value - the total value of that stock now owned (including previously owned stock).
        date - the date when the stock was sold.

      • displayNames

        void displayNames​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> names)
        Displays a list of portfolio names. This could be used to display available portfolios, stocks, or other named entities.
        Parameters:
        names - a list of portfolio names to display.
